selected_skills.name: identify_spatial_relationships
selected_skills.purpose: To interpret the diagram and understand the geometric configuration of points A, B, C, and D.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to analyze the spatial relationships between the points and segments in the diagram.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To perform calculations needed to determine the length of segment CD.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute the length of CD using the geometric principles and relationships identified.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer in the required multiple-choice format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the final answer as an option label or exact value.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_right_triangle_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: To interpret diagrams involving right triangles and extract relevant geometric information.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary containing the positions of points, lengths of segments, and any relevant geometric properties.
edge_cases: Diagrams with unclear labels or markings
